eprllib¶

eprllib¶

The package eprllib provides a set of tools for the development of energy performance research in the context of the Python programming language. The package is structured as follows:

Modules

ActionFunctions

Action Functions

Agents

Agents

Env

Environments

EpisodeFunctions

Episode Functions

PostProcess

Post Process Functions

RewardFunctions

Reward Functions
